# Archived CI/CD Workflows

This directory contains archived/redundant CI/CD workflows that have been consolidated into the main workflows.

## Archived Workflows

- `ci-fixed.yml` - Consolidated into `ci.yml`
- `ci-minimal.yml` - Consolidated into `ci.yml`
- `ci-optimized.yml` - Consolidated into `ci-cd.yml`
- `ci-robust.yml` - Consolidated into `ci.yml`
- `ci-simple.yml` - Consolidated into `ci.yml`
- `cleanup-audit.yml` - Consolidated into `ci-cd.yml`
- `code-quality.yml` - Consolidated into `ci-cd.yml`
- `config_testing.yml` - Consolidated into `ci-cd.yml`
- `dashboard_testing.yml` - Consolidated into `ci-cd.yml`
- `integration-validation.yml` - Consolidated into `ci-cd.yml`

## Active Workflows

- `ci-cd.yml` - Main comprehensive CI/CD pipeline
- `ci.yml` - Simplified CI for quick checks
- `sync-websites.yml` - Websites repository synchronization

## Consolidation Date

2025-12-14 - Agent-3 (Infrastructure & DevOps Specialist)
